body_html:
On fresh Debian 9 install, I'm able to compile the master branch without CUDA. I have no clue, why it works on fresh system and not on an old one...

OS: Debian 9
CUDA: Disabled
Cudnn: n/a
Python: 3.5.3
GCC: 6.3.0
no conda, just using pip
